Articles.Content:
I like the ones that start with 'Wehr-', like Wehrke, Wehrgel, Wehrlock. Not sure why, but I do. Unfortunately, none have popped up thus far in my career mode.

One name that did pop up that's really cool though is Maluki Kerman. Maluki. That is the most unique name I've seen in the game, ever.

Lars

Kurt

Kirk

Enemy

Edlu (Multiple times!)

Danke (Means 'thank you' in German. I killed him. He was thanking me and I killed him. )

All are legit. Most are not in my current save, though. I'll post again if I remember more.
I recently had a mission crewed by Merbal the Kerbal and Hangun "Pistol" Kerman
I just got a buzz but he decided that instead of getting out like a normal kerbal, he would get out on top of the craft and break the nose cone while he was at it.

I had a Bilbo Kerman in my old sandbox save that I accidentally deleted. He was probably the one kerbal I've ever had who I was glad didn't have the BadS flag. I also had Luke, who had his own X-Wing (which wasn't that great of a design actually) and my kerbals without a cause, James and Dean Kerman who are always assigned together on missions.

Frotop - inventor of the kafro

Edited August 17, 2014 by peachoftree

I got these

Sido Kerman

Erble Kerman

Chadzor Kerman

Ha-ha.

I had Obamah Kerman once, I kid you not. I threw him on a missile and killed him xD

I call shenanigans... the name generator parameters are publicly known, and it cannot generate a name like this. The closest possible matches would be "Obald" or "Obman".
I got Frank Kerman. I liked it just for how normal it was, plus he had the BadAss flag
I had a Burger Kerman, and my missions had gotten tastier.
Kasper and Sheldun Kerman ... I wonder from where those names came from
Mundun Kerman, Dudsdre Kerman, and Fredvan Kerman.
Roald and Charlie. I renamed my Duna mission Project Skyhook because of those two.

I got Frank Kerman. I liked it just for how normal it was, plus he had the BadAss flag

Push the button, Frank!

I one got a Kerbin Kerman.

So did I, he's never left the planet...

I also had Danburry Kerman a while back when I was new to the game. He was the first Kerbal to land and return from the Mun. After he died in a VTOL crash, I named my first space station after him.

Edited August 18, 2014 by Loligoat
I have a... Well, bad slang word one, and Neilstead occupying my new work-in-progress rover. But the names remind me of a circus for some reason...
HOCgaming got a Kerbal that had a name similar to Noodles Kerman in his Space Tourism series - it was pretty funny. However, his name wasn't actually Noodles Kerman.

Rosey Kerman

You wouldn't *believe* the amount of flak he takes in the barracks.
Hermin Kerman, Oring ("o-ring") Kerman, and Anney Kermin are my favorites thus far.
I have Mitton Kerman and my name Alex Kerman

I have Mitton Kerman and my name Alex Kerman

I recently killed Mitton Kerman! He must have respawned in your game.
lol thats funny

I always add a Johnathan J. O'Kermann

With two "n"s

My favourite was Fredfred Kerman: Because one 'Fred' just would not do.

It's the Kerbal Way.

#kerbalway

So did I, he's never left the planet...

I also had Danburry Kerman a while back when I was new to the game. He was the first Kerbal to land and return from the Mun. After he died in a VTOL crash, I named my first space station after him.

I had a Danburry Kerman. I think I killed him in one of my experimental flights... :/
